home.chatActionSheet.title: Like to chat with us?
onboarding.text.intro: <text>BrightID uses the people you know</text><text>to enforce one-account-per-person</text><text>for important applications like</text><text>voting and universal basic income.</text>
onboarding.text.privacy: <text>Prove you're a unique person</text><text>while preserving your privacy.</text>
signup.header.title: SignUp
signup.text.whatsYouName: What do your friends know you by?
signup.text.infoNotShared: Your name and photo will never be shared with apps or stored on servers
signup.placeholder.name: Name
signup.alert.nameTooShort: Your name must be at least 2 characters
signup.alert.photoMissing: A photo is required. Please press enter on the keyboard.
recovery.header.title: Recovery Code
recovery.text.askTrustedConnections: Ask your trusted connections to scan this code.
common.photoActionSheet.title: Select photo
